actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

official_title: A bill to remove certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel LOBSTER HOUSE for employment in the coastwise and fisheries trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise and fisheries trades.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel LOBSTER HOUSE for employment in the coastwise and fisheries trade.
